Author: BladderPatrol
Text: I just jokingly say ‘omg all I had to do is replace all of my meals with cauliflower and just cry when I was still hungry! Lol!!!’   Usually people KNOW diet and exercise are the keys to loosing weight but they don’t want to have to do what it takes to loose weight/eat healthier. I have found that joking about how ‘miserable’ it is confirms people’s beliefs and makes them feel more comfortable with their own eating routines (‘but I don’t want cauliflower! I want fun pizza!’)

Author: batsinabox
Text: when people comment on my weight loss i tell them about the method i used that worked for me before my ed - calorie counting and alight exercise. i always make sure to emphasize listening to your body and how you feel health wise over your desire to weigh x amount by a certain time. this way i feel like i’m spreading positivity and actually helping people rather than bringing myself down or feeling bad:)
